## Datasets to be used

In order to include Vegetation complexity and wetness in the startification the following layers were used:

* vegetation height
* vegetation density
* vegetation openness
* TWI


## Packages used

The `raster` package was used for layer processing and the package `GeoStratR` was used for the stratification of the site.
